definition: to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: If it is too flat, athletes will flip .
sentences.chinese: 如果太平，運動員將翻轉。
叉形工具用於翻轉棧板。

sentences.english: Finally, MaXiao point to my pistol suddenly flip, pointing blade.
sentences.chinese: 終於，馬嘯指向本人的手槍忽然翻轉，指向刀鋒。

sentences.english: So there I was happily pan frying the slabs when I lost my grip on one as I was turning it.
sentences.chinese: 我高興地用煎鍋煎魚片，在翻轉魚片時我失手了。

sentences.english: Review all key points which are listed on flip chart .
sentences.chinese: 回顧翻轉展示板上的要點。

sentences.english: The top flap is then flipped back up into place.
sentences.chinese: 然後將貼膜頂部翻轉回原來的位置。

sentences.english: Multiplayer Spades, Backgammon, Hearts, Checkers, and Reversi.
sentences.chinese: 多玩家黑桃王，雙陸棋，紅心大戰，跳棋和翻轉棋。

sentences.english: Unique reversal structure suitable to various IC bonding.
sentences.chinese: 獨特翻轉式結構，適用於各種尺寸IC邦定。

sentences.english: Cushion can turn over changeover to use, answer to retroflexion every week, make wear away to distributing equably .
sentences.chinese: 墊子可翻轉換用，應每週翻轉一次，使磨損均勻分佈。

sentences.english: At the end of a cycle, the magnetic field rapidly reverses its polarity.
sentences.chinese: 在週期的最後，磁場的兩極快速翻轉。

sentences.english: But when I knew this time, I saw straight away that turning over the hand is Rupa and Nama.
sentences.chinese: 但當我這次了悟時，我當下見到翻轉手臂是色與名。

sentences.english: In case of big defect, anterior rectus sheath flap was placed in addition.
sentences.chinese: 腹直肌前鞘翻轉成形可補充修補巨大缺損。

sentences.english: In this way, the double helices can be turned back and forth at will.
sentences.chinese: 如此一來，我們就可以隨意來回翻轉雙股螺旋。

sentences.english: His car rolled over then exploded.
sentences.chinese: 他的車子翻轉然後爆炸了。

sentences.english: It works by separating the mirror flip and aperture opening into two steps.
sentences.chinese: 它將鏡面翻轉和光圈打開分爲兩個步驟。

sentences.english: Don't lean too forward or back when trying a 360 flip trick.
sentences.chinese: 不要太向前或向後傾斜時，試圖一招360翻轉。

definition: to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
reversal/inversion/to reverse/to invert (upside down, inside out, back to front, white to black etc)
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to take advantage/to seize an opportunity/in passing/without taking extra trouble/conveniently
